title: Zwift news round up: Pride Month ‘Pride-On!’, Virtual Olympics & TRINITY’s Lost Generation
content:
The team over at Zwift has been busy cooking up all kinds of fabulous updates, inclusive rides, and new worlds for users to explore. Here are the coolest and newest happenings in the Zwift world. Pride-On with Zwift June is Pride Month, and to help celebrate the LGBTQIA+ community Zwift has again partnered with Athlete […]

The post Zwift news round up: Pride Month ‘Pride-On!’, Virtual Olympics & TRINITY’s Lost Generation appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
